title: Changelog
changes:
[16/07/2017]
  • Restored functionality after the latest ZeroNet update removed CORS.
  • Made the search bar 100px bigger (400px -> 500px)
  • Begun work on new design
[11/07/2017]
  • Removed index 'expiry' - there is no real schedule
  • Fixed omnibox highlighting
[19/06/2017]
  • Tweaked layout:
    • Made padding for 'warning' / notification smaller
    • Tweaked border-radius on highlights
    • Tweaked omnibox positioning
    • Very slightly tweaked homepage layout
  • Improved layout: omnibox now shows with results, which appear immediately after a key is pressed - removing the need for a search button.
  • Moved index TTL forward - Dexer needs some quick fixes
  • Implemented (primitive) preference saving
  • Implemented 'notification' window
  • More secrets! ðŸ˜‰ Expect interesting features soon!
[14/06/2017]
  • Fixed Unicode! Emoji and other non-Latin characters should display fine now.
  • Added extra bounce-in animation to the changelog
  • Cool button hover animation
  • Secret stuff! ðŸ˜‰
[10/06/2017]
  • Updated index (1770 zites)
[01/06/2017]
  • Edited index TTL to include timezone
  • Moved utils to separate javascript file
  • Changed changelog pop-up size
  • Added showElement and hideElement functions
  • Improved code formatting
  • Gave themes their own names
[31/05/2017]
  • Added changelog
  • Removed blog popup
  • Restored omnibox
  • Updated index (1721 zites)
  • Changed format to include two separate sections for zites and tags
  • Gave each theme rounded edges
